extendedIngredients.name: rainbow jimmies
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1-2 tsp rainbow jimmies (the long, thin sprinkles)

recipes.title: Skinny Funfetti Cake Batter Oatmeal

winePairing.pairingText: Riesling, Sparkling Wine, and Zinfandel are my top picks for Southern. In general, there are a few rules that will help you pair wine with southern food. Food-friendly riesling or sparkling white wine will work with many fried foods, while zinfandel is great with barbecued fare. You could try Max Ferdinand Richter Graacher Dompropst Riesling Kabinett. Reviewers quite like it with a 4 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 32 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Max Ferdinand Richter Graacher Dompropst Riesling Kabinett

recipes.instructions: Add the oats and milk to a bowl and cook on HIGH in the microwave for 2 ½ to 3 minutes, or until most of the liquid has been absorbed. (Alternatively, cook on the stovetop over medium-low heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently until most of the liquid has been absorbed.) Stir in the butter extract, and let the oatmeal sit for 1-2 minutes to thicken. Sprinkle the jimmies on top and serve immediately.

steps.step: Add the oats and milk to a bowl and cook on HIGH in the microwave for 2 ½ to 3 minutes, or until most of the liquid has been absorbed. (Alternatively, cook on the stovetop over medium-low heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently until most of the liquid has been absorbed.) Stir in the butter extract, and let the oatmeal sit for 1-2 minutes to thicken. Sprinkle the jimmies on top and serve immediately.
